Create EclipseLocator Eclipse_CONASAT3;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.Spacecraft = CONASAT3;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.Filename = 'CONASAT3_ecl.txt';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.OccultingBodies = {Earth, Luna};
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.InputEpochFormat = 'TAIModJulian';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.InitialEpoch = '21545';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.StepSize = 10;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.FinalEpoch = '21545.138';
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.UseLightTimeDelay = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.UseStellarAberration = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.WriteReport = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.RunMode = Automatic;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.UseEntireInterval = true;
GMAT Eclipse_CONASAT3.EclipseTypes = {'Umbra', 'Penumbra', 'Antumbra'};
